sentences.en: She led a tranquil life in the country.
sentences.cn: 她过着恬静的乡村生活。

sentences.en: The tranquil atmosphere of the inn allows guests to feel totally at home.
sentences.cn: 这家客栈的宁静氛围让客人们感到宾至如归。

sentences.en: There was no hilarity in the little town that same tranquil Saturday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 就是在那个星期六的下午，那个宁静的小镇上没有一点欢乐的气氛。
